name: Reincarnation: Hero of the Gun
description:
What kind of game is this?

This is a text-based idle game and my first game. It may have a bad experience.
The promotional videos and pictures at the top of this page are all the contents of this game.


What player is this game suitable for?

It is suitable for players who do not have time to play games in work and study, but want to see the game value increase.



How to play this game?

This game basically doesn't need to be played. Just hang up. When you are free, change equipment, add attribute points, skill points, and change maps.



What is the ultimate goal of this game

Perhaps when the game crashed due to the collapse of the value, the damage value of 10 billion can be basically hit at level 500 during the test.

After level 500, the value will increase crazily, but I'm not going to limit it. The battle value of astronomical numbers is the soul of this game.



Will it be updated later?

As long as it is not a bug that seriously affects the game, it will not be updated.

All suggestions and opinions will be adopted and changed in next game.
